columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DIET_MOD_CONS_C_NAME
columns.description: The consistency diet modifier category ID for the order.

columns.name: DIET_CONS_CMT
columns.description: A comment in an order record regarding the consistency of a patient's diet (e.g. soft, liquid).

columns.name: DIET_CONSIST_QST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the question record associated with the diet modifier in this row.
